reviewText: I can becauses I live in reg. 1 . I love The High Chaparral and I need the format in region 1 PLEASE!
This was exactly what I wanted and it came in great condition. I love watching this show. Thank you very much.

The video quality is excellent, and boy do these episodes bring back great memories.  All 5 PAL/European DVDs were easily converted to NTSC, Region 1, USA compatibility on a PC utilizing DVDFab SW.  Remember to turn off German soundtrack, then select U.S. English, & turn off the annoying subtitles, and you end up with a DVD that plays perfectly on your home DVD player/television. The DVD tri-fold packaging is professionally printed/manufactured.  DVDs are professionally replicated; NOT burned.  This Amazon.com buyer is most pleased.  I will purchase other seasons now.  Buy with confidence.  PS:  DVD set came from Poland.
high  chaparral  4  not  in  english and  will  not  play  on  my  blu-ray  player,  sent  back  for  a  full  refund.
I really liked it.  The production was good but had region trouble at first until i played it on my computer which allowed me to change the region
